excerpt: "Xavier Conort is a visionary data scientist with more than 25 years of data experience. He began his career as an actuary in the insurance industry before transitioning to data science. He’s a top-ranked Kaggle competitor and was the Chief Data Scientist at DataRobot before co-founding FeatureByte."
